name: Stranded in the Amazon
storyline: Travel to a derelict ship stranded in the middle of the Great Amazon jungle. The recently discovered ship set sail in the 1970s but it never reached its destination. There were no survivors and the fate of the whole crew still remains a mystery. With the help of the ghost of a little girl named Anna, you will search the ship in detail and uncover a story that is astonishing and tragic.
summary: With the help of a ghost, search a derelict ship stranded inthe jungle to uncover an astonishing mystery.
